name: Fly Away (itch) (xPheRe)
description:
It's sunday morning and soon there'll be lots of people coming to your home for a barbecue party! Great! But there's a problem... Somehow there's a fly infestation! No way to party hard with all those flies, so you get your swatter ready.

Can you control the infestation? Or will the flies ruin your party?

Fly Away is a simple game I created for the Stop Waiting for Godot Jam

Use left/right cursors to navigate the map. Enter to access an infested room.

Control your fly swatter with the mouse, and swing it with left click.

Kill all the flies before the timer ends, or they'll go infest more rooms in your house!
